messages.message: I am seeing this blocking other fix PRs into 24.01 and 24.04 due to failure of CI tests.
one way to mitigate it for now is to make the packages public in hugging face
I made the tokenizers public to unblock all of these erros
can someone please point me to the configuration of jenkins to find out what happens with the token?
Thanks let me rerun ci on these backports

@Nikolaos Kofinas it is possible that we are using the api token for the instabase org.
Huggingface has depreciated organization tokens and mandated the use of user tokens. I don’t know where this token is maintained for CI pipelines but you should ask releng to confirm and update it.
hmm that may be the problem, cc @Sławek Biel which fixed it for prod I think
@Nikolaos Kofinas, CI/CD passed for 24.01 but still failed for the 24.04 release branch with the same error.
Yes seeing same here. 24.01 is unblocked for me now, 24.04 is still failing with same error.
